name: Just Plain Chess
description:
It's just chess. Really.

This project started as a way for me to learn 3d modeling using Blender. After I had created a full chess set, I decided to go all-in and make the chess set playable.

See renders of the lovely models I created here: https://calebjross.com/blender-3d-asset-gallery/

The models were created as part of this course: https://www.udemy.com/course/blendertutorial/

The game logic was take from this tutorial: https://www.raywenderlich.com/5441-how-to-make-a-chess-game-with-unity
